response.overview: It follows the life story of two very special pandas in the Qingling Mountains of norther China told through the unique relationship they have with the scientist who follows them. Four years in the making, revealing panda behaviour never seen before, this feature length film takes you on a fantastic journey into the enchanted kingdom of the Qinling Mountains to produce the most intimate portrait of the panda ever undertaken.
response.title: Panda: Call of the Wild
